text: Mowinckel (2026). ggsegFlechsig: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas 'ggseg' Ecosystem. R package version 2.0.0, https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegFlechsig.

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegFlechsig
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegFlechsig
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegFlechsig
text: data/*.rda — Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R — Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegFlechsig-package.R — Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats R/sysdata.rda — Internal palette data (brain_pals) data-raw/ — Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegFlechsig
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegFlechsig
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegFlechsig
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: package contains dataset plotting Flechsig (1920) historical atlas functional segregation ggseg ggseg3d, based supplementary materials Pijnenburg et al., NeuroImage, 239, 2021 DOI; Version 1; 15-01-2021. P.E. Flechsig, Anatomie Des Menschlichen Gehirns und Ruckenmarks auf Myelogenetischer Grundlage, G. Thieme (1920) learn use atlases, please look documentation ggseg ggseg3d

title: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: recommend installing ggseg-atlases ggsegverse r-universe: can install development version ggsegFlechsig GitHub :   Please note ‘ggsegFlechsig’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.
code: options(repos = c(     ggsegverse = 'https://ggseg.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  install.packages('ggsegFlechsig') # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("ggsegverse/ggsegFlechsig") library(ggsegFlechsig) library(ggseg) library(ggplot2)  ggplot() +   geom_brain(     atlas = flechsig(),     mapping = aes(fill = label),     position = position_brain(hemi ~ view),     show.legend = FALSE   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = flechsig()$palette, na.value = "grey") +   theme_void() library(ggseg3d)  ggseg3d(atlas = flechsig()) |>   pan_camera("right lateral")

title: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas (1920) — flechsig
text: Brain atlas Flechsig myelogenetic cortical parcellation 46 regions per hemisphere. Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas (1920) — flechsig
text: Flechsig P (1920). Anatomie des menschlichen Gehirns und Ruckenmarks auf myelogenetischer Grundlage. Leipzig: Georg Thieme. Pijnenburg R et al. (2021). Myelo-architectonic mapping Flechsig atlas. NeuroImage, 239, 118274. doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2021.118274

title: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas (1920) — flechsig

what: ggsegFlechsig: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegFlechsig-package
title: ggsegFlechsig: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegFlechsig-package
text: Flechsig myelogenetic cortical atlas 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'. Based supplementary materials Pijnenburg et al. (2021).

title: ggsegFlechsig: Flechsig Myelogenetic Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegFlechsig-package
ggsegFlechsig 2.0.0
text: flechsig now ggseg_atlas object (ggseg.formats) containing 2D 3D data. separate flechsig_3d object removed. Use ggplot() + ggseg::geom_brain(atlas = flechsig) 2D plots ggseg3d::ggseg3d(atlas = flechsig) 3D plots — object. ggseg.formats now hard dependency (Depends). Package URLs updated LCBC-UiO ggseg GitHub organisation.
